description: Humorous due to childish behavior in an adult context
title: Get Out of My Fort
n_1: Mike and Linda were having a heated argument in their living room.
c1_1: You're the one who's always immature!
c2_1: Says the man who built a fort out of sofa cushions.
n_2: Linda crossed her arms, glaring at Mike.
c1_2: This fort is my safe space!
n_3: Mike puffed out his chest, trying to look serious.
c1_3: Yes, and you are not allowed in here!
c2_3: Fine, I'll leave you to your 'fort'.
n_4: Linda walked out of the room, leaving Mike sitting proudly in his fort.
